SELECT
FROM erp_product ep WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM erp_product ep WHERE brand_id = #{brandId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND category_id = #{categoryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND product_model = #{productModel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT m_product.*
,epcp.property_name property_property_name,epcpv.property_value_name property_property_value_name FROM ( SELECT , eb.brand_name AS brand_name, epc.category_name as category_name FROM erp_product ep LEFT JOIN erp_brand eb ON eb.id = ep.brand_id AND eb.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category epc ON epc.id = ep.category_id AND epc.data_status = 1 WHERE ep.id = #{productId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ep.data_status = 1 ) m_product LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epi ON epi.product_id = m_product.id AND epi.data_status = 1 AND epi.img_type = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epidesc ON epidesc.product_id = m_product.id AND epidesc.data_status = 1 AND epidesc.img_type = 2 LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku_property epsp ON epsp.product_id = m_product.id AND epsp.data_status = 1 AND epsp.is_sku = 0 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property epcp ON epcp.id = epsp.property_id AND epcp.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value epcpv ON epcpv.id = epsp.property_value_id AND epcpv.data_status = 1 ORDER BY epcp.data_order DESC,epcpv.data_order DESC,epi.img_order DESC,epidesc.img_order DESC

SELECT m_product.*
,epcp.property_name property_property_name,epcpv.property_value_name property_property_value_name FROM ( SELECT , eb.brand_name AS brand_name, epc.category_name as category_name FROM erp_product ep LEFT JOIN erp_brand eb ON eb.id = ep.brand_id AND eb.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category epc ON epc.id = ep.category_id AND epc.data_status = 1 WHERE ep.product_no = #{productNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ep.data_status = 1 ) m_product LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epi ON epi.product_id = m_product.id AND epi.data_status = 1 AND epi.img_type = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epidesc ON epidesc.product_id = m_product.id AND epidesc.data_status = 1 AND epidesc.img_type = 2 LEFT JOIN erp_product_sku_property epsp ON epsp.product_id = m_product.id AND epsp.data_status = 1 AND epsp.is_sku = 0 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property epcp ON epcp.id = epsp.property_id AND epcp.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_category_property_value epcpv ON epcpv.id = epsp.property_value_id AND epcpv.data_status = 1 ORDER BY epcp.data_order DESC,epcpv.data_order DESC,epi.img_order DESC,epidesc.img_order DESC

SELECT epe.sku_id,SUM(1) sku_rent_count,SUM(1) + SUM(IFNULL(erop.real_return_product_sku_count,0))- SUM(IFNULL(erop.return_product_sku_count,0)) AS sku_can_return_count FROM erp_order eo LEFT JOIN erp_order_product_equipment eope ON eope.order_id = eo.id LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON epe.id = eope.equipment_id LEFT JOIN erp_return_order_product erop ON erop.return_product_sku_id = epe.sku_id AND erop.data_status = 1 WHERE eo.buyer_customer_id = #{customerId} AND eo.order_status = 20 AND eo.data_status = 1 AND eope.actual_return_time IS NULL AND eope.equipment_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY epe.sku_id
